name: Strength Periodization
description: A structured training approach to progressively build strength over time.

cards.title: Linear Progression for Strength Gains
cards.description: Gradually increasing weight over time to build muscle and power.
bulletpoints: Start with manageable weights and increase weekly
Prioritize good form over rapid progress
Adjust workload based on fatigue levels

cards.title: Deload Weeks for Recovery and Growth
cards.description: Reducing intensity periodically to prevent overtraining and optimize gains.
bulletpoints: Maintain training frequency with reduced intensity
Allow muscles and joints to recover before resuming intensity
